title: Cheese and walnut souffl√© tart
ingredients: ['200g ready-made puff pastry', '4 eggs, beaten', '300ml single cream', 'pinch of ground nutmeg', '150g Stilton or other similar blue cheese, crumbled', '50g walnut pieces, chopped', '1 thick slice lean ham, about 40g, diced', 'freshly ground black pepper']
